participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, Alex is passionate about music and values self-expression highly.
participant_1.background: My pets are a great source of entertainment when I'm not rock climbing. my brother is currently couch surfing at my house. I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself. I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid. I don't have any kids because I'm focused on my career.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and slightly rebellious, Jordan expresses herself through humor and enjoys the little joys of life.
participant_2.background: I once drew a picture of the officer as a pig and showed it to him. I enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every morning and worry about my cats while on tour. my brother works at best buy. I enjoy watching my favorite sport, football, on social media. I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a bit of a musician myself, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself.
Cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and piano, and I'm also a singer. I've been playing music since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I've been playing guitar since I was 14. I'm not very good, but I love it.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
Cool! I love rock and roll too. What bands do you like?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorites are probably The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are great bands! I love them too.
Me too! They're all so iconic.
I'm glad we have something in common.
